specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out. Recommended Use Outer
